sentences.en: A cup of coffee will refresh you.
Allow me to refresh your memory.
Before I interviewed Ms Waters, I read her book again just to refresh my memory.
sentences.cn: 采访沃特斯女士之前, 我又读了一遍她的书,以唤起自己的记忆.

sentences.en: He has drunk one cup of coffee to refresh oneself.
He refreshed himself with a glass of iced tea.
sentences.cn: 他喝了杯冰茶提了提神。

sentences.en: He walked on the opposite side of the street to refresh his memory of the building.
sentences.cn: 他走在街的对面，努力回忆这座建筑的原貌。

sentences.en: I looked at the map to refresh my memory of the road.
sentences.cn: 我看看地图以唤起对这条路的回忆.

sentences.en: I think I'll just refresh myself with a cup of tea before I go to meet the children.
sentences.cn: 我想在见孩子们之前先喝杯茶来恢复一下精神.

sentences.en: May I refresh your memory of [ about ] the last lecture before we go on?
sentences.cn: 在我们上课之前请各位再回忆上次的课程好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Please refresh my memory as to where we've met before.
sentences.cn: 请提示一下,以前我们在什么地方见过.

sentences.en: Press the "reload" button on your web browser to refresh the site and get the most current version.
sentences.cn: 点击网页浏览器上的“刷新”按钮来刷新页面，显示最新的版本。

sentences.en: She reclined over the garden gate as if to refresh herself a while.
sentences.cn: 她靠在庭园的栅栏门上,好像要清凉一会儿似的.

sentences.en: That is why plants in a room refresh the air.
sentences.cn: 这就是室内的植物能使空气新鲜的原因.

sentences.en: The lotion cools and refreshes the skin.
sentences.cn: 润肤液使皮肤凉爽清新。

sentences.en: They had stopped by a spring to refresh themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们曾在一处泉边停歇休息。

sentences.en: They stopped at a pub to refresh themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们在酒馆停下来,喝几杯酒.

sentences.en: This glass of iced tea will refresh you.
sentences.cn: 喝下这杯冰茶你会感到清凉.

trans.tran_cn: 使（精神）振奋，使恢复；更新
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel less tired or less hot

trans.tran_cn: 使精神抖擞，重新斟满，翻新，使记起，刷新
trans.tran_en: if you refresh your computer screen while you are connected to the Internet, you make the screen show any new information that has arrived since you first began looking at it

trans.tran_cn: 使清新； 使恢复精力， 使振作精神， 使恢复活力； 重新振作
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel less tired or less hot
